      • findAll

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.List<RoleDTO> findAll()
        Get the roles the currently authenticated user has access to.

        A system administrator has access to all the roles. A project administrator has access to the roles in their own project.

        Returns:
        the list of entities

      • findOneByProjectNameAndAuthorityName

        public java.util.Optional<RoleDTO> findOneByProjectNameAndAuthorityName(java.lang.String projectName,
                                                                        java.lang.String authorityName)
        Get the role related to the given project with the given authority name.
        Parameters:
        projectName - the project name
        authorityName - the authority name
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the role if it exists, and empty otherwise
